name: Haunted Casino
overview: Sega Saturn game software released as the last 18 ban (X designation) software. Contents that the hero who visited the hall "Haunted casino" where men like witches live wins the soul and wages with the witches in the table game. Players walk and explore the inside of the building made of 3D CG. Besides the opponent witches, there are also items that can be used during the game and traps. The hall is three stories high, three game discs. Data on each floor is recorded on each disc. Nagata Tata is in charge of character design .
